alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson; Marshall (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:27PM CDT until July 02 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marshall County in northeastern Alabama... Central Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Southwestern DeKalb County in northeastern Alabama... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 226 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Skyline to 6 miles east of Woodville to near Grant, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Guntersville, Rainsville, Henagar, Sylvania, Fyffe, Hollywood, Powell, Grant and Geraldine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
